title: U.S. would win any trade war, says Joule Financial's Quint Tatro
text:
U.S. would win any trade war, says Joule Financial's Quint Tatro 12:41am IST - 04:43 
People seem to forget that the United States really drives the world's economy, and it's good that China acknowledged it with a promise to open its economy and lower tariffs, says Quint Tatro, managing director at Joule Financial. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
People seem to forget that the United States really drives the world's economy, and it's good that China acknowledged it with a promise to open its economy and lower tariffs, says Quint Tatro, managing director at Joule Financial. Aleksandra Michalska reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2HrPhKg
